headers.value: default-src 'self' https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.firebaseapp.com https://www.gstatic.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.firebaseapp.com https://www.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.googleapis.com wss://*.firebaseio.com;
